thread.title: Boddy-Calhoun questionable for Gophers; Croft listed as backup QB
thread.title_full: Boddy-Calhoun questionable for Gophers; Croft listed as backup QB - StarTribune.com

author: startribune.com
title: Boddy-Calhoun questionable for Gophers; Croft listed as backup QB
text:
The Gophers released their depth chart and injury report tonight for Saturday's game at Northwestern, listing cornerback Briean Boddy-Calhoun as questionable.
Boddy-Calhoun injured his right knee last week against Ohio but will not need surgery.
Safety Antonio Johnson suffered a concussion last week but is not listed on the injury report. Today, coach Jerry Kill said Johnson was progressing through the concussion protocol.
Also notable on this depth chart, it's the first time the team has listed true freshman Demry Croft as the backup quarterback. That was listed as Chris Streveler, even though Croft has been taking all the second-team reps in warm-ups.
Here's a link to the full depth chart and injury report .
